title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 2 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 2 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Rob react to the situation between Hall of Famer Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Lebron James. The guys question how Lebron chose to respond to Abdul-Jabbar's criticism regarding the meme Lebron put out on Instagram regarding Covid, the flu and the cold. Doug and Rob get into it about Tom Brady after his last couple of subpar games. The guys react to UCLA canceling the Holiday Bowl at the last second, and how opposing coach Dave Doeren chose to handle it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
